subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: P. K. Subban’s second goal of the game, on a power play in the second overtime, gave Montreal a Game 1 victory in its conference semifinal series against top-seeded Boston.
snippet: P. K. Subban’s second goal of the game, on a power play in the second overtime, gave Montreal a Game 1 victory in its conference semifinal series against top-seeded Boston.
